verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) In my <S%H6869>trouble<s%> I <S%H7121>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And He <S%H6030>answered<s%> me.
<S%H4100>What<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> to you, and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> shall be <S%H3254>done<s%> to you, You <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%>?
<S%H8150>Sharp<s%> <S%H2671>arrows<s%> of the <S%H1368>warrior,<s%> With the [burning] <S%H1513>coals<s%> of the <S%H7574>broom<s%> <S%H7574>tree.<s%>
<S%H190>Woe<s%> is me, for I <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> in <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> For I <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar!<s%>
Too <S%H7227>long<s%> has my <S%H5315>soul<s%> had its <S%H7931>dwelling<s%> With those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
I am [for] <S%H7965>peace,<s%> but <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H1696>speak,<s%> They are for <S%H4421>war.<s%>
